name: Cohzem of the Shrouded Bough
title: None
desc: The best kept secrets never leave the shadows. It is said where Cozhem walks, darkness follows.

name: Ezekiel, The King
title: Bastalion Campaign
desc: The crown is a heavy burden to one who obsessively chases freedom. Perhaps that is why he left.

name: Marin, The Loremaster
title: Bastalion Campaign
desc: A title granted in the absence of other options. A reminder of loss, death, and purpose.

name: Jules, Lurker's Eye
title: Bastalion Campaign
desc: An uncaring god may still have use for the ant crawling across its skin.

name: Mimir, The Ascended
title: Mystril Campaign
desc: Truth and lies always had been his domain. This just made it official.

name: Calbert, The Arisen
title: Rotgarten Campaign
desc: He had never trusted their judgement. Instead of his power, death would be their birthright.

name: Hayward, The Inheritor
title: Rotgarten Campaign
desc: His escape was narrow, and he would never take this life for granted again.

name: Rhesh'a, Godslayer
title: FFXIV
desc: The pressure flickering behind his eyes has granted him strength beyond measure.

name: Petalorian, True Dragon
title: WoW
desc: Their internal war has finally metamorphosized into terrifying unity.

name: The Kings in Bone
title: Mafia 2.0
desc: What fools are they to call themselves kings.

name: Ezekiel, The Serpent
title: Bastalion Campaign
desc: He casts off his heritage as easily as a snake sheds its skin.

name: Marin
title: Bastalion Campaign
desc: How can one rebuild from nothing? His entire world has burned.

name: Jules Ward
title: Bastalion Campaign
desc: In the shadow of the infinite, she seeks meaning where she knows it could never exist.

name: Cohzem
title: None
desc: Good trade isn't built on burnt bridges.

name: Locke, The Admiral
title: Olde Campaign
desc: Did he brave those seas because he loved the waves, or was it the blood he spilt upon them?

name: Aldebaran
title: Rotgarten Campaign
desc: His oath, his sire, his lover. He realized too late what monster he had given everything to.

name: Calbert
title: Rotgarten Campaign
desc: A benevolent hand, a gentle touch, a promise that he would care for them always.

name: Renaissance
title: Rotgarten Campaign
desc: She reaches, strives, and calls for a legacy nearly forgotten. She may have put them to sleep, but she cannot wake them from their dreams.

name: Talenti
title: Rotgarten Campaign
desc: Be quick. Be clever. Keep striving for that ideal, for the perfect creation, and never let the world catch up.

name: Autumn, The Claw of Irori
title: Rotgarten Campaign
desc: She strives to be dangerous. She is dangerous. It feels like a victory.

name: Constantine
title: Rotgarten Campaign
desc: She takes up the sword to protect her own. When people start looking to her for guidance, she doesn't know how to deny them.

name: Capreo
title: Rotgarten Campaign
desc: He comes to the surface to hunt and study it. Years later, he returns to the depths a hero.

name: Michael Dowd
title: Mafia 1.0
desc: Truth is a powerful advantage to have, but how far can it carry him?

name: Caliban
title: Mafia 2.0
desc: How easy it is to fool oneself into believing one's own facade.

name: Nathan
title: Mafia 2.0
desc: When even the constants in his life are mutable, what is there left to cling to?

name: Trip
title: Mafia 1.0
desc: A cat formerly owned by Western mobster Needles, now owned by Michael. Trip is sweet and loves pets, and is also trained in reconnaissance.

name: Petalorian
title: WoW
desc: Be it a curse or a cruel twist of fate, the clamor inside their united mind is hard to think through.

name: Cyril
title: Bird Cult
desc: He doesn't feel like a monster. He knows they won't think the same.

name: Molzi
title: Threshold Campaign
desc: If the door cannot be forced open, it must instead be tricked or eased. She knows this better than most.

name: Rolmir
title: Threshold Campaign
desc: Is it really so wrong to be himself? And which self should he really be?

name: Ezekiel Lockwood
title: Bastalion Campaign
desc: He cradles his freedom like an injured bird, snapping at the cats who try to claim it.

name: Juliette, The Devout
title: Bastalion Campaign
desc: In knowledge, we find salvation. In gates, we find power. In eyes, we find the truth.

name: Haruk, The Researcher
title: Olde Campaign
desc: How do you save an enemy who everyone has forsaken? He doesn't know, but one day he'll find out.

name: Ragni
title: Magical Girls
desc: Collateral damage? She's been collateral damage her entire life.

name: Sable
title: Magical Girls
desc: She never really believed she could uphold the dream they had once strived for. After all, they were many, and without them she was alone.

name: Bowen
title: Rotgarten Campaign
desc: The only things he missed about being alive were the feeling of the sun on his fur, and the ease with which others would talk to him.

name: William Braxton
title: Mafia 2.0
desc: There's always something to prove, and someone it must be proven to.

name: Rhesh'a
title: FFXIV
desc: Some days he would sit on the deck, listen to the lapping of the waves, and wish for nothing more than peace.

name: Petastrasz
title: WoW
desc: If might makes right, then surely he can do no wrong.

name: Valcaris
title: WoW
desc: They say such gods are beyond the petty matters of humanity, but they're the only ones who have cared for him.

name: Marian
title: Bird Cult
desc: Is it a blessing or a curse? She's not sure it matters which. She has to live with the consequences either way.

name: Rip
title: FR
desc: Death seeps through the air of Spinehome, so thick you could choke on it. By some twist of fate, they find themselves its keeper.

name: Mikhail
title: FR
desc: No one better to inherit than the dragon who saw it all, beginning to bloody end. He wishes they hadn't chosen him, but he can't deny the reasoning.

name: Julie, The Vengeful
title: Bastalion Campaign
desc: Ever so slowly, the prey would gain the strength to hunt back.

name: Haruk
title: Olde Campaign
desc: Knowledge at all costs, except for the others. Anything he does, he does to himself.

name: Fenster
title: Olde Campaign
desc: It takes so long for his eyes to adjust to the light, he nearly forgets how to see.

name: Locke
title: Olde Campaign
desc: The quiet, the calm, all that remains of a terrible storm.

name: Aquila, The Wronged
title: Side Campaign
desc: If her fire means she will never be hurt again, be assured she will use it.

name: Mimir
title: Mystril Campaign
desc: It doesn't matter how severe his injuries. He will be there for his grandson.

name: Caspar
title: Mystril Campaign
desc: He had always been closest to his grandfather. Everyone else would call him weak.

name: Elmak
title: Rotgarten Campaign
desc: He had known to expect something below. He hadn't thought it would be so terribly ravenous.

name: Jean
title: Mafia 2.0
desc: He runs as fast as his legs can carry him, but never quite manages to leave behind his regrets.

name: Rhesh'a, The Navigator
title: FFXIV
desc: The view from the crow's nest was everything to him.

name: Ashalorian and Pete
title: WoW
desc: They aren't perfect, but in tandem they become a force to be feared.

name: Elizot
title: WoW
desc: The transformation, once it started, could not be stopped. She writhed and shrieked and lost parts of herself to the beast, and then to the shade that followed.

name: Theo
title: Bird Cult
desc: Surviving kept him occupied, day and night, for so long he nearly forgot there could be anything more.

name: Mira
title: Bird Cult
desc: The day she loses everything is rooted firmly in her mind. It cannot be forgotten. It cannot be overwritten, no matter how hard she tries.

name: Averne
title: Side Campaign
desc: As he grows, he learns to look for what people try to hide.

name: Rolmir, The Studious
title: Threshold Campaign
desc: It isn't what he wants, sure. But they need him, and that's more important.

name: Candle
title: Bastalion Campaign
desc: The carved gourd they wear for a skull is meant to be reassuring. It isn't.

name: Caspar, The Cursed
title: Mystril Campaign
desc: To fall in a mess of feathers and cries... maybe they were right about him after all.

name: Holly
title: Side Campaign
desc: Mostly she burns because it's what she's always done. She doesn't know anything else. It would, however, be a lie to say she doesn't enjoy it.

name: Darcy
title: Rotgarten Campaign
desc: He came first because he was curious. He stayed because he admired the way they persisted, even knowing the world was right in calling them monsters.

name: Eduard Pickman
title: Rotgarten Campaign
desc: He could barely remember how he came to be like this, but there was always the nagging feeling it had been intentional.

name: Hayden
title: Rotgarten Campaign
desc: He wonders how deep the rabbit hole goes, and fears learning the answer.

name: Lemon Twist, The Slayer
title: Rotgarten Campaign
desc: If allying himself to the enemy is the easiest way to kill them, then he'll do exactly that.

name: Valeria Gordan
title: Magical Girls
desc: She doesn't care for their approval. She doesn't. She doesn't. She doesn't.

name: Martin
title: Magical Girls
desc: Being accused of murder meant he couldn't go to their funerals, talk to their loved ones, or even rest and cry. He had to find his closure in stranger places yet.

name: Ashalorian
title: WoW
desc: He would always claim his vices were his virtues, and no one cared enough to correct him.

name: Sunnybun
title: WoW
desc: Money wasn't everything. If she could be happy here, why try for something more?

name: Juliette, The Forgotten
title: Bastalion Campaign
desc: Would a caring gaze have saved her then? It's useless to ruminate on could-have-beens.

name: Marin, The Duskwalker
title: Bastalion Campaign
desc: Once upon a time, he appeared here, nothing more than what he was.

name: Aquila
title: Side Campaign
desc: People always underestimate her. She's stronger than she looks. One day they'll learn to fear her.

name: Amique
title: Side Campaign
desc: Fearing the dark, he wards it away with hands full of wax and wicks.

name: Alde
title: Side Campaign
desc: The dead are as silent as the night sky. Sometimes they wish those bodies would speak.

name: Lemon Twist
title: Side Campaign
desc: He venture out under the safety of a mask, giving his life for a task innumerable wanderers had failed to complete.

name: Miki
title: Olde Campaign
desc: She sees every sin. Whether she lacks the capacity to judge him or loves him despite everything, he'll never know.

name: Ingra
title: Rotgarten Campaign
desc: Her crimes exist, sure, but they're victimless. Why should she be punished for an act that hurts no one?

name: Eliza Sunbringer
title: Rotgarten Campaign
desc: The divine magic she carries is seen as a symbol that her people's sins might truly be redeemed.

name: Arcaseere
title: Rotgarten Campaign
desc: They had once longed for a fleshy form, but after time and innovation, their current is more robust.

name: Dandelion
title: Rotgarten Campaign
desc: Her sentience had been a hot topic for years before she proved it, craning open her rotten mouth to ask them if there could be anything left for her.

name: Oriel
title: None
desc: Remember, dearest, that your role does not define you. You choose what pain and love you bring into the world, and I believe you can be gentle.

name: Sezue Ikido
title: None
desc: The tang of metal in their mouth is nothing noteworthy. They wonder if others would feel the same.

name: Breadcrumb
title: Magical Girls
desc: Was he truly just a greedy pigeon? What use did a pigeon have for the damned?

name: Pete
title: WoW
desc: It's difficult to remember what he was when he is so much less now.
